name: switch_run_mode

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Specifies the run mode. 'auto' will enable automatic operation, while 'manual' allows for manual control.

description: Switches the system's run mode between 'auto' for automatic operation and 'manual' for manual control. Use this function to toggle the current mode based on operational requirements.

name: switch_chain

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description: Specifies the blockchain network. 'Base' refers to the Base chain, 'ETH' to the Ethereum network, and 'BSC' to the Binance Smart Chain.

description: Sets the system's blockchain network to one of the specified chains: 'Base', 'ETH' (Ethereum), or 'BSC' (Binance Smart Chain). Use this function to switch the operational blockchain network based on your requirements.
